hints.content: To divide a shape in half, we divide the whole into **$2$ equal parts**.

This rectangle is divided into $3$ equal parts:  

![A rectangle with 2 vertical lines dividing it into 3 equal parts.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/aa21dd00a645af952fdd9323cd4347e0651cc554)

All of these rectangles are divided into halves:  

![A rectangle with 1 diagonal line dividing it into 2 equal parts.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/c4d50054814a2606c83f2890a47ba316e2292180)

![A rectangle with 1 horizontal line dividing it into 2 equal parts.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/6be3ed369063d9e09e462e94333d0fd4f3673522)

![A rectangle with 1 vertical line dividing it into 2 equal parts.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/184f357683f832b018670b2fbb81fe9479e99f81)

question.content:
**Which rectangles are divided into halves?**
